author: Mikasa Ackerman
comment: i like this watch face but it needs more options! such as how often the cat changes activites.  i wanted it to be hourly not daily :(
title: more options please

author: Nicole Bowermaster
comment: Any chance for update to support Zenwatch? Pretty unusable in always on ambient mode

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Hi Nicole,
Thank you for rating us. And Cat is not only supporting  Asus Zenwatch, which also include Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, LG Watch Urbane, Sony Smartwatch3.
We will try our best to work out the ambient mode in next version.

title: Great until low bit mode kicks in.

author: Reece Williams
comment: Love this face but update claims change face direction and hands direction, yet there are NO setting to do this. So lose a star.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Hi Reece,Really appreciate for rating us! Your suggestion was  reported to Magic team directly. We will try our best to add this feature into next version as we really wanna get 5 stars, so badly!

title: What update

author: Brittney Nicole Miguel
comment: Adorable. Looks like there's an option for a black background on this watch face but I can't access it.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Daevian. Thank you a lot ! We are going to try our best to add more customized options into Magic face. And we also wanna to make it to be interactive. You will see  it soon.Really appreciate it:) !

title: So cute

author: Emily Phan
comment: A bit low res, but otherwise good. Please make a dog version 😄.
title: Cute

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Daevian. Thank you for your support ! :) If you wanna see more unique Magic faces ? Please feel free to try ' Magic watchface' .Really appreciate it:) !

author: Vojtěch Boček
comment: Why is the number for 3 o'clock upside down? (or is it? doesn't look much like "3" anyway). Also, can you enable the cards to show up while in ambient mode (maybe add a config option for it)?  Thanks for this beautiful watch face!

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Hi Vojtěch , Really appreciate for rating us. Your advice was reported to Magic team. we will try to update number and add the feature in next version.
And please follow us on twitter, you could find more interesting things about Magic team there :) https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface

title: Hi, couple of notes:
